website_summaries.verdict: One of the best Pioneer amplifiers to get if you’re building a 7.1-based home theater.
pros: Includes Pioneer’s MCACC system for configuring itself for optimal audio quality
Supports Apple’s AirPlay 2 tech for easily playing back music from iPhone or iPad over WiFi
Has phono preamp for connecting to a turntable
cons: Many of the best features require a firmware update, which can be a pain to install

customer_reviews.title: VSX-934 is AWE FULL!!!
customer_reviews.text: This unit failed right out of the box. Pioneer support was ok, however the device is DOA! DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love Pioneer receivers
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in my area of the house after setting up a VSX-LX503 with the main tv surround system. They are both great and on super sakes right now. They thought of everything in their designs and audio quality is superb for music and the less demanding lower fidelity movie audio. You can’t go wrong with this. That being said, I really dont think you can go wrong with any brand these days. Just make sure you get the power and number of channels you want.
customer_reviews.author: Void

customer_reviews.title: Awesome 4K Receiver
customer_reviews.text: After the initial setup, connect the receiver to the internet and perform an update. The receiver will indicate progress. When the receiver indicates update is complete, keep waiting (don't do anything else) until content returns to the display screen (TV). Excellent receiver. All features worked after the update. Purchased this receiver particularly for its Zone 2 capabilities allowing same or different HDMI programing.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Lasiter

customer_reviews.title: A well thought out design
customer_reviews.text: It has been 20 years since I purchased a new Pioneer A/V receiver. I had to read the operating manual a couple times and google some of the words in the manual. Sort of like switching from a flip phone to a smart phone. Now that I've used it for a few weeks I love. I like when I turn on my TiVo that the receiver starts also because of some two way communication magic through the HDMI cable.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Zone B use knocks out Listening Modes
customer_reviews.text: Have been happy with this receiver for the most part. Bought to replace my very old Yamaha that had no HDMI inputs after buying a 4K smart TV. Just know that, if you turn zone B on, none of the listening modes will be available. Took me a bit of time to figure out this was the cause. Was never mentioned in the operating manual and could not find anywhere else where this was discussed.
customer_reviews.author: David Aiken

customer_reviews.title: Costco. Value for price, pass thru for hdmi has hiccups.
customer_reviews.text: Works great except for issues with passthru for some a/v ites (ie Nintendo switch). When running a switch thru the pass thru it would cut out for a few second every so often which would ruin the game you were playing. Other than that it works great, ARC works well, pairs well with Klipsch surround system from costco.
customer_reviews.author: Denishar Feder

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck.
customer_reviews.text: I really dont think you can beat this reciever for the money if your lookong for a 5.1.2. Clean interface to work with. Easy setup, really my only complaint is crossover control is lacking but again... The price on this thing for what it does is better then great with the right speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Adam

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for my husband. He has been very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Ellie

customer_reviews.title: Lots of HDMI inputs
customer_reviews.text: Great sound when paired with Klipsch speakers. Lots of HDMI inputs. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Craig C

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me...and most people
customer_reviews.text: Replacement for older Pioneer receiver that didn't support my upgrade to DirecTV 4K service...love and the output and input options...
customer_reviews.author: WILLIAM WOMACK

customer_reviews.title: Worthless
customer_reviews.text: Worked for three months and then died. Can't return either.
customer_reviews.author: Ray R

customer_reviews.title: Great receiver
customer_reviews.text: Easy to setup. We had an older receiver that we replaced with this. Setup was really easy. I did have to go through the tv screen and put an hdmi to it in order to finish setup. My setup uses an optical cable for sound, so that was something to keep in mind. I love that it has two zones so I can control the outside speakers as well. Also easy setup. Speakers sound good. I’m not an audiophile by any means, so it sounds good to me!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Shaner

customer_reviews.title: Great Receiver
customer_reviews.text: We are just getting around to setting this up and it has all the whistles. The only complaint I have so far is you have to hook it up to a TV to get it setup. We used a small TV to get ours going as our media room isn't complete yet so we made do. Overall this is going to work perfect for us in our media/gameroom
customer_reviews.author: J.P.

product_meta.title: Pioneer VSX-934 7.2-ch Network AV Receiver
product_meta.description: Immerse in 3D surround sound of Dolby Atmos or DTS: x, or you can still enjoy similar effects by Dolby Atmos height vitalize* and DTS virtual: x* even without height or surround speakers. Featuring Ultra HD, HDR10, HOG, and Dolby visions pass through with support for HDCP 2. 2. , The VSX-934 offers evermore life-like images. You can stream songs from various sources via Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, DTS Play-Fi, sonos system and Apple airplay 2*. Other highlights include powered zone 2 feature with a dedicated DAC, personal preset buttons, and 2 HDMI outputs. * Available with future firmware update
feature_bullets: Create the optimum acoustic environment with pioneer’s MCACC (multi-channel acoustic calibration system), developed with the expertise of professional recording studios. With the custom microphone, The system automatically compensates for differences in speaker size, level and distance, and equalizes response.

By connecting the VSX-934 to Sonos Connect, you can play any music or audio source on your Sonos app. You can group the VSX-934 with other Sonos devices on the network, or use it independently. The AV receiver will automatically turn on and switch input as soon as you play music on your Sonos app.

With the powered feature, the VSX-934 can directly drive speakers in another room, without the need for a separate amplifier. What’s more, the dedicated DAC for zone 2 lets you listen to all digital Audio sources.

The VSX-934 is equipped with zone B Audio output terminals for expanding the main zone sound by connecting your wireless headphone Dock. You can listen to the sound playing in the living room via wireless headphones.

Stream songs from compatible devices with the built-in Bluetooth Wireless Technology (ver. 4. 2 + LE). The VSX- 934 features A2DP/AVRCP profiles, with support for SBC/ AAC codecs. With Wake on Play function, the AV receiver automatically wakes up and switches input when a Bluetooth source starts playing.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars50 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
